title: New league client broken(?)
body: it launches, but my status says Do Not Disturb and it says i have no friends and you can't click play. _**FIX THIS RIOT!!!**_

replies.body:
Do you experience any of the same issues if you launch into the *Legacy Client* from the login screen?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know!
